title: Fifty Shades of Blue
description: Good News - Paul’s wife wants to get really rude in bed!Bad News - She doesn’t want to do it with Paul!It’s lucky Paul has such a good sense of humour. First of all, his wife unexpectedly leaves him for a enormously endowed rock singer, then he catches his new, wannabe model girlfriend cheating on him in the kinkiest of ways.Feeling battered and bruised, he takes the only sensible course open to him and throws up everything to go and stay on a tiny Croatian island so he can ‘find himself’ painting the fifty shades of blue of the Adriatic Sea.Instead, what he finds there is Fiona - stylish, witty, artistic Fiona who’s a little bit quirky, a little bit wild and definitely more than a little bit naughty.She should be Paul’s perfect partner, but there’s something different about Fiona, something that means their relationship involves a lot more than the usual ups and downs...
author: Jem Lowe
